name: Proper Joe
challenge: If you‚Äôve done this before you know how it goes. Get your driver a PROPER cup of JOE. Head to 1st Street and park near PROPER JOE (1st and B). Head inside and buy your driver the drink of their choice. Once they have their drink and you are outside of the coffee shop, they‚Äôll give you your next clue.

name: Centennial Trail Man
challenge: Have your driver take you to CADY PARK (located on the river, accessed from 1st & Maple). Park in the lot and follow the BLUE signs to the CENTENNIAL TRAIL trailhead.
instruction: Send a pic of YOUR TEAM WITH THE MAN IN THE RED PANTS to your group‚Äôs text message conversation to get your next clue.

name: Snohomish River Trail
challenge: Follow the signs back to the SNOHOMISH RIVER TRAIL. Follow the trail until you‚Äôre standing on the trail below the Gazebo.
instruction: Send a pic of YOUR TEAM WITH THE GAZEBO BEHIND YOU to your group‚Äôs text message conversation to get your next clue.

intro.challenge: Along this trail you might have noticed plaques/signs that provide information on how Snohomish was founded. Use the information ALONG THE RIVER TRAIL to find the answers and get your next clue!
intro.instruction: Pick either ENGLISH & MATH or HISTORY and complete the task. You may switch tasks at any time.

detourA.title: ENGLISH & MATH
detourA.challenge:
Unscramble this word for a hint to find the right sign:

NKIP AMSLNO

Add together the three years the Snohomish River froze over for several weeks.
detourA.instruction: Text the ANSWER to your group‚Äôs text message conversation to get your next clue.

detourB.title: HISTORY
detourB.challenge: In 1859 a cottage was delivered by steamship on the river. It was Snohomish‚Äôs first Post Office, Court House, and City Hall.
detourB.instruction: Text the NAME OF THE COTTAGE to your gro in up‚Äôs text message conversation to get your next clue.

name: Find 'Phil'
instruction: Get back in your car and have your driver take you back to the Holman houses. Park in the teardrop. Once your driver has parked, race for the mat and check-in!

name: Royal Runaround
challenge:
It is time to shine as the royalty that you are! Have your driver take you to the DOLLAR STORE.

Once you have parked, safely head into the store and purchase FIVE COSTUME ACCESSORIES fit for Royalty.
instruction: After you have completed your purchase and returned to your chariot (car), put on your ROYAL OUTFIT AND TEXT A PIC of your team to receive your next clue.

name: Royal Paparazzi
challenge:
Now that you‚Äôre in full royal glam, it is time to strut for your citizens! They want PROOF you have visited Snohomish‚Äôs ROYAL LOCATIONS.

Snohomish‚Äôs TWO ROYAL LOCATIONS are:

  1. Burger King (Ave D & 15th)
  2. The Pink Castle (Ave D between 5th and 6th)
While visiting each location, be sure to get a picture of your whole team in front of each location, be sure to highlight your ROYAL BLING! These pictures MUST be of your group outside of your car, with each location in the background.
instruction: Text BOTH PICTURES to your group‚Äôs text message conversation to get your next clue.

name: Royal Bonus
challenge:
THIS PART OF THE TASK IS OPTIONAL, BUT IF COMPLETED COULD EARN YOU AN ADVANTAGE LATER IN THE GAME.

If you‚Äôre daring, be the first to make your way to Snohomish‚Äôs SECRET ROYAL LOCATION:

KING CHARLEY‚ÄôS
(30th and Hwy 9)

Get a picture of your whole team in front of the SECRET ROYAL LOCATION. This picture MUST be of your group outside of your car, with the location in the background.
instruction: Text the SECRET LOCATION PICTURE to your group‚Äôs text message conversation to attempt to win the FAST FORWARD advantage! Only the first team to send the pic will receive this advantage.

intro.challenge: M‚ÄôLadies and M‚ÄôLords the time has come to visit the ROYAL ARENA. Ye must chooseth one ROYAL GAME to continue this adventure. Pick a game and make haste, for upon completion of these games, the true monarchs shall be declared!
intro.instruction: Pick either GIANT MINI GOLF or 100 YARDS OF BALLIN‚Äô and complete the task. You may switch tasks at any time.

detourA.title: GIANT Mini Golf
detourA.challenge:
Have your driver take you to the Holman Castle and check-in with the COURSE MARSHALL.

Take 1 SOCCER BALL for each team member and begin the course. If there is a team on the hole that you are ready to start, you must wait for that team to complete the hole before beginning. If a ball goes out of bounds, that player must start over on that hole. Both team members must complete the hole to move onto the next.

There are enough soccer balls for 2 TEAMS to be working on the course at the same time. If there are no soccer balls available, at the start of the course you must wait for a team to complete the challenge before your team can begin. Every member of your team must complete the whole course in order before receiving your next clue.
detourA.instruction: Once your team has completed the whole course, get your next clue from the COURSE MARSHALL.

detourB.title: 100 Yards of Ballin‚Äô
detourB.challenge:
Have your driver drop you off at the HIGH SCHOOL FOOTBALL FIELD and check-in with the REFEREE.

Take 1 FOOTBALL and head to the WEST END ZONE of the football field (the same end zone as the Holman Houses). You and your teammate must pass the football to each other for the entire length of the football field without dropping the ball. If you drop the ball, the REFEREE will have the team RETURN TO THE WEST END ZONE and start over. Keep this in mind when determining how far to run before throwing the ball.

The challenge must be completed as follows:

  • TEAM MEMBER A will throw the ball to the TEAM MEMBER B.
  • TEAM MEMBER A will then run down the field. TEAM MEMBER B will remain where they caught the ball.
  • After TEAM MEMBER A runs past TEAM MEMBER B, TEAM MEMBER B may pass the ball back to TEAM MEMBER A.
Repeat the steps above as many times as needed to get to the EAST END ZONE. If a team member moves when they are not supposed to, the REFEREE will have the team RETURN TO THE WEST END ZONE and start over.

Arguments with the REFEREE will cause the team to receive a 2 MINUTE PENALTY after completing the task.
detourB.instruction: When you have completed this task, return your football to get your next clue from the REFEREE.

name: Find 'Phil'
challenge: It's time to race for the mat!
instruction: Phil has left the castle! To end this leg, you can find Phil near the SNOHOMISH HIGH SCHOOL (tennis) COURTS.

name: Blindly Guess The Foods
challenge:
READ THE WHOLE CLUE.

This leg of the race will start a little bit differently. We‚Äôre going to do a food challenge.

One person will be blindfolded, and the other person will hand them food. You have to guess 3 FOODS correctly to move on. You may touch, smell, and taste the food.

To begin, one team member must choose to be the ROYAL TASTER. As the ROYAL TASTER, you must correctly identify 3 FOODS while blindfolded. Your partner may help by handing you each food item, BUT your partner MAY NOT SPEAK during this challenge.

If you cannot identify 3 FOODS items after tasting all 10, you may move on.

If your partner gives you any clues during the tasting, your team will receive a 2 MINUTE PENALTY after completing the challenge.
instruction: After completing the tasting, you will be handed your next clue. Just a hint - you may want to hang onto your blindfold after the challenge.

name: Guess the Foods Advantage
challenge:
Congratulations on winning the FAST FORWARD advantage. Instead of guessing 3 FOODS correctly, you will only need to identify 2 FOODS correctly!

Additionally, if you can‚Äôt identify 2 FOODS after only 9 of the food items, you may move on.

If your partner gives you any clues during the tasting, you will receive a 2 MINUTE PENALTY after completing the challenge.
instruction: After completing the tasting, you will be handed your next clue.

intro.challenge: In the final detour of the race today, you will help prepare for a ROYAL CELEBRATION.
intro.instruction: You may choose to assist the ROYAL GROUNDS CREW or the ROYAL BAKER to complete their task. You may switch tasks at any time.

detourA.title: Royal Grounds Crew
detourA.challenge:
The ROYAL GROUNDS KEEPER needs help cleaning up for the celebration!

Make your way to the GROUNDS KEEPER STATION. Your team must help to clean up the grassy area for there will be a coronation here soon.

Choose one person to be the CLEANER and one to be the CALLER. Have the CLEANER put on the blind fold that you just used in the last challenge and spin three times in the grass, then get on their hands and knees. The CALLER will give directions to the CLEANER to find all of the items left behind. The CLEANER must wear a blindfold and crawl through the grass to collect the items and bring them back to the CALLER.
detourA.instruction: Once you have collected all three items, bring them to the ROYAL GROUNDS KEEPER to receive your next clue.

detourB.title: Royal Baker
detourB.challenge:
The ROYAL BAKER needs help creating cupcakes for the celebration!

Locate the BAKING STATION. Your team members must create a set of cupcakes that match the ROYAL BAKER‚ÄôS example cupcakes.
detourB.instruction: Once the ROYAL BAKER is satisfied with your set, they will give you the next clue.

name: Mini Games Galore
challenge:
Today we celebrate the 4TH SNO-MAZING RACE, the only way we really know how: mini games.

There are 5 GAMES your team must work together to complete. All 5 games must be completed, but they can be completed in any order. If the game you are trying to complete is busy, you must wait for it to become available or try a different game.

  • Wiffle Ball Tic-Tac-Toe
    Play tic-tac-toe against your teammate with wiffle balls and buckets until someone gets three in a row.
  • Stack The Apples
    Each team member must stack 4 apples and keep them standing until all 8 apples are stacked.
  • Defying Gravity
    Work with your teammate to keep 5 balloons from touching the ground for 1 full minute.
  • Sponge Toss
    Choose one person to be the SPONGE TOSSER, and one person to be the SPONGE WRINGER. Grab two sponges and soak them in water. Toss the soaked sponge to your teammate and they will wring it out into their bucket until the water is above the fill line on the bucket.
  • Human Ring Toss
    Choose one person to be the RING TOSSER and one to be the RING TARGET. Each team member stands in a marked circle and tosses the rings at the team member identified as the target. The target can move but must keep their arms straight up in the air and remain in the circle. You must get 3 rings on the target.
instruction: Once the 5 GAMES are completed, find Jessica for your next clue.

name: Lucky Number 13
instruction: Race to the mat! The first team to reach the mat will be this year‚Äôs winners!
